## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility
Located at position (x=53.0, y=-83.0)
- Consists of a Burner Mining Drill at position (x=53.0, y=-83.0) and a Wooden Chest at position (x=52.5, y=-84.5) for storing mined coal.

### Copper Ore Mining and Processing Facility
Located at positions around (x=-23.0, y=-68.0)
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-23.0, y=-68.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (x=-23.5, y=-69.5) for storing copper ore.
- Burner Inserter at position (x=-24.5, y=-69.5) facilitating movement of items.
- Additional Wooden Chest at position (x=-24.5, y=-67.5) for storage.

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility
Located at positions around (x=-14.0, y=-53.0)
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-14.0, y=-53.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (x=-14.5, y=-54.5) for storing iron ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (x=0.0, y=0.0) for smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Multiple BeltGroups facilitating transportation of materials between entities.

### Iron Plate Storage Facility
Located at position (x=-16.5, y=-64.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-16.5, y=-64.5) for storing iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (x=-17.5, y=-64.5) connected to a Stone Furnace at position (x=-19.0, y=-65.0).

### Miscellaneous Storage
- Wooden Chest at position (x=1.5, y=0.5) containing coal and iron plates.
- Wooden Chest at position (x=3.5, y=0.5) for additional storage.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting transport belts
- Ensure there are no gaps between transport belts when connecting them. Verify the alignment and continuity of belts from position (x=-24.0, y=-69.5) to (x=-25.5, y=-69.5).

### Errors due to lack of fuel
- Ensure all Burner Mining Drills and Burner Inserters have adequate fuel to operate. Regularly check and refuel entities to maintain continuous operation.

### Errors due to no ingredients in furnaces
- Ensure that Stone Furnaces have the necessary ingredients to smelt. Regularly supply furnaces with the required ores to prevent idle time.

### Inserter waiting for source items
- Check that the source entities for inserters have items to be moved. Ensure that the supply chain is not disrupted and that items are being produced and transported efficiently.
